articles.title: National Guard Deploys to Washington D.C. as Trump Declares Public Safety Emergency
articles.description: Hundreds of National Guard troops have begun their 30-day deployments in Washington, D.C., following President Trump's directive to address what he claims is an 'out-of-control crime' situation in the nation's capital. City leaders, however, dispute the necessity, citing a significant drop in violent crime rates. [1, 8, 12]

articles.title: Trump and Putin to Hold Summit in Alaska Amid Ukraine War Discussions
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin are scheduled to meet in Alaska on Friday at a U.S. military base in Anchorage. The summit is expected to focus on a potential resolution to Russia's ongoing war in Ukraine, with European leaders emphasizing the importance of respecting Ukraine's territorial integrity. [1, 3, 10, 12]
